Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Book = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true local vCharacter
local leftHandWeld local bookClone local spark
local bookSound
-- Coroutines local spikeCo local ropeCo local prisonCo
local rope local prison local spike
local ropeTextRef local prisonTextRef local spikeTextRef
local sgRef local frameRef local prisonBtnRef local ropeBtnRef local spikeBtnRef
local ropeDamage = 30 local spikeDamage = 30 local fireballs = {}
local spikeClone
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local spikePart = Instance.new("Part") spikePart.FormFactor = 3 spikePart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 2, 1) spikePart.Shape = "Block" spikePart.Name = "Spike" spikePart.CanCollide = false
local spikeMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") spikeMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59092052" spikeMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59801821" spikeMesh.Parent = spikePart
ropePart = Instance.new("Part") ropePart.FormFactor = 3 ropePart.Size = Vector3.new(1.75, 1.75, 1.75) ropePart.Transparency = 0.8 ropePart.Shape = "Ball" ropePart.Name = "rope" ropePart.CanCollide = false
local ropePartMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") ropePartMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" ropePartMesh.Name = "Mesh" ropePartMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" ropePartMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" ropePartMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.04, 0.04, 0.04) ropePartMesh.Parent = ropePart
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Size = 0.1 fire.Heat = 5.0 fire.Color = Color3.new(51/255, 102/255, 204/255) fire.Parent = ropePart
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0.0, ropePart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) float.Name = "Floating"
function ropeCD() local duration = 5 while duration > 0 do if ropeTextRef then ropeTextRef.Text = duration ropeTextRef.Visible = true end duration = duration - 1 wait(1) end if ropeTextRef then ropeTextRef.Visible = false end rope = Tool:FindFirstChild("rope") if rope then rope.Value = 0 end if ropeBtnRef then ropeBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791591" ropeBtnRef.Active = true end end
function spikeCD() local duration = 10 while duration > 0 do if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if spikeTextRef then spikeTextRef.Text = duration spikeTextRef.Visible = true end duration = duration - 1 wait(1) end if spikeTextRef then spikeTextRef.Visible = false end spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if spike then spike.Value = 0 end if spikeBtnRef then spikeBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791072" spikeBtnRef.Active = true end end
function prisonCD() local duration = 15 while duration > 0 do if prisonTextRef then prisonTextRef.Text = duration prisonTextRef.Visible = true end duration = duration - 1 wait(1) end if prisonTextRef then prisonTextRef.Visible = false end prison = Tool:FindFirstChild("prison") if prison then prison.Value = 0 end if prisonBtnRef then prisonBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791781" prisonBtnRef.Active = true end end
function blow(parent, dmg, hit) if parent then if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = player creator.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function firefall() local offset = 4.0 for i = 1, 12 do fireballs[i] = ropePart:Clone() fireballs[i].Parent = game.Workspace if i < 4 then fireballs[i].Position = myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(i * offset, 20.0, 0.0) elseif i < 7 then fireballs[i].Position = myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0.0, 20.0, (i - 3)* offset) elseif i < 10 then fireballs[i].Position = myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0.0, 20.0, (i-6) * -offset) else fireballs[i].Position = myTorso.Position + Vector3.new((i-9) * -offset, 20.0, 0.0) end local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, fireballs[i]:GetMass() * 100.0, 0) floatForce.Parent = fireballs[i]
debris:addItem(fireballs[i], 3.5) fireballs[i].Anchored = true fireballs[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(fireballs[i], ropeDamage, hit) end) end wait(0.3) for i = 1, #fireballs do fireballs[i].Anchored = false end end
function shoot() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vCharacter == nil or vPlayer == nil then return end
for i = 1, 12 do local pos = CFrame.Angles(0, i * math.pi/6, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
local spawnPos = myTorso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + (pos * 5.0)
spikeProjectile = spikePart:Clone() spikeProjectile.Name = "rope" spikeProjectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) local floatForce = float:Clone() floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, spikePart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = spikeProjectile spikeProjectile.Velocity = pos * 75.0 spikeProjectile.Parent = game.Workspace spikeProjectile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(spikeProjectile, spikeDamage, hit) end) debris:addItem(spikeProjectile, 4) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
rope = Tool:FindFirstChild("Rope") prison = Tool:FindFirstChild("Prison") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike")
sgRef = vPlayer.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("SpellGui") frameRef = sgRef:FindFirstChild("SpellGuiFrame")
if rope.Value == 1 or spike.Value == 1 or prison.Value == 1 then bookSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BookSound") if bookSound then bookSound:Play() end leftArm = vCharacter["Left Arm"] if leftArm then bookClone = Book:Clone() bookClone.Parent = vCharacter spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") spark.Color = Color3.new(139/255, 0, 139/255) spark.Parent = bookClone bookWeld = Instance.new("Weld") bookWeld.Part0 = leftArm bookWeld.Part1 = bookClone bookWeld.Name = "LeftGrip" bookWeld.Parent = leftArm bookWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1.2, 0.0, 0.0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0.0, math.pi/2) Book.Transparency = 1.0 end
if rope.Value == 1 and (ropeCo == nil or coroutine.status(ropeCo) == 'dead') then ropeCo = coroutine.create(ropeCD) coroutine.resume(ropeCo) if frameRef then ropeBtnRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("rope") ropeTextRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("OText") if ropeBtnRef then ropeBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791874" ropeBtnRef.Active = false end end firefall() elseif prison.Value == 1 and (prisonCo == nil or coroutine.status(prisonCo) == 'dead') then prisonCo = coroutine.create(prisonCD) coroutine.resume(prisonCo) if frameRef then prisonBtnRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("prison") prisonTextRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("RText") if prisonBtnRef then prisonBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791906" prisonBtnRef.Active = false end end players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] ~= vPlayer then tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar then tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempHumanoid and tempTorso then distance = (tempTorso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 30.0 then if tempChar:FindFirstChild("PrisonScript") == nil then newScript = Tool.PrisonScript:Clone() newScript.Parent = tempChar newScript.Disabled = false end end end end end end elseif spike.Value == 1 and (spikeCo == nil or coroutine.status(spikeCo) == 'dead') then spikeCo = coroutine.create(spikeCD) coroutine.resume(spikeCo) if frameRef then spikeBtnRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("Spike") spikeTextRef = frameRef:FindFirstChild("SText") if spikeBtnRef then spikeBtnRef.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59802033" spikeBtnRef.Active = false end end shoot() end wait(1.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 if spark then spark:Remove() end if bookClone then bookClone:Remove() end Book.Transparency = 0.0 end Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if bookClone then bookClone:Remove() end Book.Transparency = 0.0 if spark then spark:Remove() end if bookSound then bookSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Book = Tool.Handle
local rope local spike local prison
local spikeText
local sg
local vCharacter local vPlayer
-- Animations local bookAnim
function castSpell(key) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then ropeCast() elseif key == "e" then spikeCast() elseif key == "r" then prisonCast() end end
function ropeCast() prison = Tool:FindFirstChild("Prison") rope = Tool:FindFirstChild("Rope") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if rope and rope.Value == 0 then rope.Value = 1 end if prison and prison.Value == 1 then prison.Value = 0 end if spike and spike.Value == 1 then spike.Value = 0 end end
function spikeCast() prison = Tool:FindFirstChild("Prison") rope = Tool:FindFirstChild("Rope") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if spike and spike.Value == 0 then spike.Value = 1 end if rope and rope.Value == 1 then rope.Value = 0 end if prison and prison.Value == 1 then prison.Value = 0 end end
function prisonCast() prison = Tool:FindFirstChild("Prison") rope = Tool:FindFirstChild("Rope") spike = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spike") if prison and prison.Value == 0 then prison.Value = 1 end if rope and rope.Value == 1 then rope.Value = 0 end if spike and spike.Value == 1 then spike.Value = 0 end end
function createGui() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "SpellGui" if vPlayer then sg.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui end
local frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "SpellGuiFrame" frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.35, 0) frame.Visible = true frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 70, 0, 210)
local ropeBtn = Instance.new("ImageButton") ropeBtn.Name = "rope" ropeBtn.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791591" ropeBtn.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) ropeBtn.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) ropeBtn.Parent = frame ropeBtn.MouseButton1Click:connect(ropeCast) local ropeText = Instance.new("TextLabel") ropeText.Text = "" ropeText.Parent = frame ropeText.Name = "OText" ropeText.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) ropeText.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) ropeText.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 ropeText.Font = 1 ropeText.FontSize = 5 ropeText.Visible = false
local spikeBtn = Instance.new("ImageButton") spikeBtn.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791072" spikeBtn.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) spikeBtn.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 70) spikeBtn.Parent = frame spikeBtn.Name = "Spike" spikeBtn.MouseButton1Click:connect(spikeCast)
local spikeText = Instance.new("TextLabel") spikeText.Text = "" spikeText.Parent = frame spikeText.Name = "SText" spikeText.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) spikeText.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 70) spikeText.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 spikeText.Font = 1 spikeText.FontSize = 5 spikeText.Visible = false
local prisonBtn = Instance.new("ImageButton") prisonBtn.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59791781" prisonBtn.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) prisonBtn.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 140) prisonBtn.Parent = frame prisonBtn.Name = "prison" prisonBtn.MouseButton1Click:connect(prisonCast) local prisonText = Instance.new("TextLabel") prisonText.Text = "" prisonText.Parent = frame prisonText.Name = "RText" prisonText.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64) prisonText.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 140) prisonText.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 prisonText.Font = 1 prisonText.FontSize = 5 prisonText.Visible = false end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end bookAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BookAnim) if bookAnim then print(bookAnim.className) bookAnim:Play() end end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(castSpell) end vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) createGui() end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

vCharacter = script.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local duration = 3.5
if vCharacter ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myTorso ~= nil then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
local thorn = Instance.new("Part") thorn.FormFactor = 3 thorn.Shape = "Block" thorn.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2) thorn.CanCollide = true thorn.Position = myTorso.Position thorn.Parent = vCharacter
local thornMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") thornMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54653968" thornMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59793260" thornMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 0.8) thornMesh.Parent = thorn
local thornWeld = Instance.new("Weld") thornWeld.Parent = myTorso thornWeld.Part0 = myTorso thornWeld.Part1 = thorn thornWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)) while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(3) duration = duration - wait(0.5) wait(0.5) end if thorn then thorn:Remove() end if thornWeld then thornWeld:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 myTorso.Anchored = false end
wait(2) script:Remove()
